attributes.action: To Ban all face coverings in public places to help improve the effectiveness and efficiency of CCTV
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned believe that all methods of head coverings should be banned in certain public places, i.e. Shopping Malls, sporting arenas, etc.

Items to be banned should include:
	
1:  Hooded tops (kept down)

2:  Niqabs (full face coverings, cultural not religious issue)

3: Cycle Helmets

4:  Baseball caps

5:  any other items that hide/distguise the face from CCTV or person recognising.

As in the current climate and in the best interest of public well being this would improve relations between certain cultural groups and minimise any security risks.
